backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores contact form submissions and demo bookings in maps, exposes public functions to submit and retrieve them, and validates that all fields are non-empty.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single fix: updating the second CTA button text color in Hero.tsx to a high-contrast color for legibility in all states.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose and key content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'NEET Botany Mentor' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles all page sections (Navigation, Hero, AboutMe, Services, WhyChooseMe, CourseStructure, DemoBooking, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact, Footer, WhatsAppFloat) with anchor IDs for smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/AboutMe.tsx: About Me section displaying mentor Kuldeep Patidar's portrait, bio (BHU B.Sc./M.Sc., 5 years at ALLEN KOTA and NARAYANA INDORE), mission statement, and qualification badges.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with phone/WhatsApp/email/location detail cards and a form that submits name, email, phone, and message to the Motoko backend, showing success or error states.
Course Structure section rendering four program features (syllabus coverage, weekly tests, monthly reports, WhatsApp support) in a timeline-style grid with step circles and info cards.
frontend/src/components/DemoBooking.tsx: A React component that renders a demo class booking section with a form collecting name, phone, and preferred time, submitting via the useBookDemo mutation hook and showing a success state on completion.
frontend/src/components/FAQ.tsx: A static FAQ section component that displays a list of common questions about the NEET Botany course using a collapsible Accordion UI, with numbered items and green-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer component displaying the brand logo, quick navigation links with smooth-scroll, and contact info (phone, WhatsApp, email, location) on a dark green background.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: A full-screen hero section featuring a background botany image with overlay, mentor name/title heading, CTA buttons scrolling to demo and contact sections, and three stat badges.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a 'Free Demo' CTA button, scroll-aware background styling, and a responsive hamburger menu for mobile viewports.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a grid of NEET Botany tutoring service cards (e.g., mentoring, live classes, PYQ analysis) with icons, plus a CTA card that scrolls to the demo booking section.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: Displays a placeholder testimonials section with three student review cards and a 'coming soon' notice, using star ratings and quote icons.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloat.ts: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button linking to a pre-filled chat message for NEET Botany mentoring inquiries.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseMe.tsx: Displays a grid of five reasons to choose the mentoring program (e.g., NCERT expertise, personalized attention), with the first card styled as a highlighted gradient feature card.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, login, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports two React Query mutation hooks—useSubmitContactForm and useBookDemo—that call the ICP backend actor to submit form data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles including Google Fonts imports, Tailwind directives, a green-and-white OKLCH CSS variable theme (light/dark), and utility classes for section headings and green gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom colors (green palette, WhatsApp), fonts (Merriweather/Inter), shadows, border radii, keyframe animations, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate).
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the KULDEEP PATIDAR NEET Botany tutoring website, including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features covering all major page sections.
